plot: Vasilis wants to sell his mother's old house to property developers in the hope that in this way he will be able to cope with his desperate financial straits.
title: Antiparochi
plot_es: Vasilis wants to sell his mother's old house to property developers in the hope that in this way he will be able to cope with his desperate financial straits.
plot_en: Vasilis wants to sell his mother's old house to property developers in the hope that in this way he will be able to cope with his desperate financial straits.
